TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlValueGetter extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: A used by the class to pass attribute, text, and white space values as a Common Language Runtime (CLR) type compatible with the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) type of the attribute, text, or white space.
Docs.returns: An object containing the attribute, text, or white space value. The object is a CLR type that that corresponds to the XSD type of the attribute, text, or white space value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An XmlValueGetter`delegate` is useful if the CLR value of an attribute, text, or white space node is already available, and avoids the cost of converting it to a `string` and then reparsing it again for validation.
For more information about the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class, see the [XmlSchemaValidator Push-Based Validation](../Topic/XmlSchemaValidator%20Push-Based%20Validation.md) topic, or the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class reference documentation.
## Examples The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. The example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator> class.
